Interface FocusedEnvironment<T extends ClassWrapper<? extends S>,S>

  • All Superinterfaces:

    public interface FocusedEnvironment<T extends ClassWrapper<? extends S>,S>
extends Environment<T,S>

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T focusMember()
      Return the focus language of the focused environment.
      default boolean isFocused()
      Return true if the environment has a focus.

      • Methods inherited from interface api4kbj.Environment

        apply, contains, containsMapping, containsMappings, containsMember, containsMembers, findMapping, isCompatibleWith, isCompatibleWithClass, isPreserving, mappings, members, optionalFocusMember, optionalPreserves

    • Method Detail

      • isFocused

        default boolean isFocused()
        Description copied from interface: Environment
        Return true if the environment has a focus. If true, the method Environment.optionalFocusMember() should return a Some, otherwise it should return a None.
        Specified by:
        isFocused in interface Environment<T extends ClassWrapper<? extends S>,S>
        Returns:
        true if the environment has a focus
